name: Grapploct
flavorText:
A body made up of nothing but muscle makes
the grappling moves this Pokémon performs with
its tentacles tremendously powerful.

previous.name: Clobbopus
previous.flavorText:
It’s very curious, but its means of investigating
things is to try to punch them with its tentacles.
The search for food is what brings it onto land.

next.name: Sinistea
next.flavorText:
This Pokémon is said to have been born when
a lonely spirit possessed a cold, leftover cup
of tea.

The search for food is what brings it onto land.
